coreAttributes.name: imp arcanist's hat
coreAttributes.description: A hat of the sort you'd expect to see a witch or wizard wearing. Although perhaps it was of great value at one time in its life, it looks to have had countless owners since then, and is covered in signs of extensive wear and tear.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your arcanist's hat.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s arcanist's hat and roughly pull it off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your arcanist's hat and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s arcanist's hat and roughly pulls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the arcanist's hat.
replacementText.playerNPC: You get [npc.name] to wear the arcanist's hat.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.herHim] to wear the arcanist's hat.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] gets you to wear the arcanist's hat.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces you to wear the arcanist's hat.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] gets [npc2.name] to wear the arcanist's hat.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces [npc2.herHim] to wear the arcanist's hat.
